# NETWORK::NETWORK_SET_IN_FREE_CAM_MODE

## Parameters
* **BOOL** inFreeCamMode

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Set the local in free cam Mode. This is used to ensure remote machines track
where the free cam is looking
